description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6untj","text":"Striatal Mitochondria Isolation Protocol used in the Mazmanian lab for Seahorse experiments and others","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpe9l","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lgj7","text":"\n ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p0iv","text":"500 mL of MSHE (pH 7.2) for isolation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u3ll","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29lvg","text":"●     210 mM mannitol  (Sigma, Cat #M1902) (19.13 g) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7qnt","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3jlk","text":"●     70 mM sucrose (Sigma, Cat #S0389) (11.98 g)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nlbf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"424q4","text":"●      5 mM HEPES (Sigma, Cat #H3537) (2.5 mL of 1M stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfi6k","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7saa3","text":"●     1 mM EGTA (Sigma, Cat #E3889) (2 mL of 250 mM stock)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2hj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b22cs","text":"●      0.2% fatty  acid-free (Fraction V) Bovine-serum albumin (BSA) (1 g, or 10 mL of 10% stock) (Sigma, Cat #A3803)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef1sm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r2gm","text":"Measure all the powders into a 500 mL bottle.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4aqnq","text":"Fill the bottle to about 400 mL with tissue culture grade water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ltfg","text":"pH to 7.2 at 37˚C with 1M KOH solution while stirring.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tgsr","text":"Pour contents of 500 mL bottle into a 500 mL graduated cylinder. Fill up to 500 mL with tissue culture grade water.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rpoa","text":"Filter through 0.22 µm vacuum filter into a 500 mL receiver.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ve7j","text":"Store at 4˚C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f83mv","text":"Prepare it fresh the day before experiment. Or freeze it for future use (maximum of 3 months). Once you defrost it, adjust the pH. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1espu","text":"Also prepare, 250 mL of MSHE without BSA","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"668f8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r1da","text":"10% Digitonin (in TC-grade water). (Sigma, Cat #D5628)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cri68","text":"Bring to 95˚C in the heat block to dissolve digitonin.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9082","text":"Store at 4˚C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bfa8","text":"Pre-chill a 15 mL glass Dounce homogenizers and pestles to 4˚C on ice. Wash the glass tubes with MSHE.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bnsc","text":"After dissection transfer tissue to the 15 mL dounce homogenizer containing MSHE.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vs19","text":"Homogenize with 10 strokes of the pestle.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f6k7","text":"Transfer the tissue homogenate back into the 2 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bebc2","text":"Centrifuge at 2000g for 3 minutes at 4˚C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3h47v","text":"Aliquot the filtered supernatant into chilled 2 mL Eppendorf tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0kuu","text":"Centrifuge the 2 mL Eppendorf tubes at 12,000g for 10 min at 4˚C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3s3e6","text":"While waiting for the spin to complete, place 10% digitonin in the heat block to bring it back into solution. Once dissolved, remove it from the heat block to cool before using.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1fsl","text":"Add 40 µL of 10% digitonin into 20 mL of MSHE (for 0.02% w/v). Scale down if you have less than 10 tubes.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uk99","text":"Aspirate supernatant (leave the white layer). Resuspend pellets in 700 µL of the digitonin + MSHE solution (400 µL first then 300 µL). ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f0rc","text":"Centrifuge again at 12,000g for 10 min at 4˚C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jbcg","text":"Aspirate most of the white layer (the light fluffly layer that sits atop the dark brown mitochondria) of the pellet. Resuspend in 700 µL of MSHE.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tj8v","text":"Centrifuge again at 12,000g for 10 min at 4˚C.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac297","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and remaining white layer of the pellet.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oigp","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 30 uL of MSHE (change final volume or buffer as needed).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Striatal Mitochondria Isolation Protocol
